001.name: Robot
001.text: Sir, the problem with the panels is now solved.

002.name: Robot
002.text: The mechanical team is currently working on powering the engine back.

004.name: Commander
004.text: However, we might need to stay here for a while.

005.name: Commander
005.text: While you were away, we have found what hit us. It crashed into the planet with us.

006.name: Commander
006.text: We need to send out a search party to investigate…

007.name: Commander
007.text: And collect any information about it

008.name: Commander
008.text: However, we will need to prepare the equipment needed for the search.party.

009.name: Commander
009.text: Report to the Researcher, Armorer, and the Weapon Technician.

011.name: Commander
011.text: He will relay you further instructions.
